alert.note: Alert for Lyon (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 07 at 8:24PM CDT until June 09 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kansas... Neosho River Near Neosho Rapids affecting Lyon County. Cottonwood River near Emporia affecting Lyon County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cottonwood River near Emporia. * WHEN...Until Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, South bank of the Cottonwood River 1 mile south of Emporia floods. At 23.0 feet, North bank of the Cottonwood River begins to flood. Lowland flooding occurs along the Cottonwood River from Plymouth to Neosho Rapids. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 23.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon and continue falling to 6.6 feet Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. This product along with additional weather and stream information is available at www.weather.gov/top/.
